title: Makeup and Beauty Blog Monday Poll, Vol. 858
description: So…what is the Monday Poll? Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007). 1. Stuffing or mashed potatoes? Both speak volumes to my carb-loving heart, but I love mashed potatoes just a little bit more. 2. Apple pie or apple cider? Um, both? 3. Do you have any Thanksgiving day traditions? Not really, although I do short circuit if I don’t get at least one slice of pecan pie. I gotta have it! 4. Have you ever hosted Thanksgiving? Yes, a handful of times, and yes, there was pecan pie. HAHAHA! 5. Something you’re thankful for? So thankful to spend time with my little family of El Hub, Connor, Rosie and Marnie. Our house is full and so is my heart! Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict, Karen P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. html:
So…what is the Monday Poll?

Excellent question! It isn’t, contrary to its name, an actual poll, like with little clicky buttons. It’s just a list of more or less random questions I’ve been posting on this blog every Monday morning for the past quadrillion years (since 2007).

1. Stuffing or mashed potatoes?

Both speak volumes to my carb-loving heart, but I love mashed potatoes just a little bit more.

2. Apple pie or apple cider?

Um, both?

3. Do you have any Thanksgiving day traditions?

Not really, although I do short circuit if I don’t get at least one slice of pecan pie. I gotta have it!

4. Have you ever hosted Thanksgiving?

Yes, a handful of times, and yes, there was pecan pie. HAHAHA!

5. Something you’re thankful for?

So thankful to spend time with my little family of El Hub, Connor, Rosie and Marnie. Our house is full and so is my heart!

Your friendly neighborhood beauty addict,

Karen

P.S. Here are the questions to copy/paste with your answers in a comment. Talk to ya soon.

1. Stuffing or mashed potatoes?
2. Apple pie or apple cider?
3. Do you have any Thanksgiving day traditions?
4. Have you ever hosted Thanksgiving?
5. Something you’re thankful for?

Reader Interactions
